title: Analysis of Virtual Classroom Effectiveness and Development of Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with fundamental online learning tools
context.additional_context: Analyzes learning effectiveness in virtual classroom environments for in-service practitioners and develops project-based solutions for real-world challenges.

learning_goals: They can quantitatively analyze the gap between expected and actual educational outcomes in virtual classroom settings.
They can identify and prioritize key challenges such as network connectivity, learning environments, and resource shortages.
They can present virtual classroom improvement strategies feasible in smartphone-centric, resource-constrained environments as project deliverables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
